div.span: Texas parents: We’re continuing to provide at-home instructional support for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, even though our school buildings remain closed.

p.span: Distance learning continues through May 15. Our campus may be closed but learning continues.
Please do your part in preventing the spread by following guidelines set by the health organizations such as:
Limiting your attendance at social events and public events
Isolate yourself if you begin to experience symptoms such as fever or shortness of breath

We understand that the sudden extension of our break creates a hardship on your family due to work and child care, but our hope is that you know this decision was not rushed into and your best interest was taken into account.
Here are a few links to educate yourself on COVID-19:

span.strong: If your child will be late or miss school, please email the Attendance Clerk at attendance@treetops.org. Be sure to list your child's name, grade level, and reason for missing.

strong.span: Please check us out on Twitter (@school_treetops):

High school students from Treetops School International will be traveling to Scotland on March 7th. Our arrival in Edinburgh takes us to visit Edinburgh Castle and on an excursion to Rosslyn. At Loch Ness, we will go on a cruise on the lake. After that, we make our way to the Isle of Skye and Eilean Donan Castle. Next, we have a scenic ride through Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park. We conclude our tour with a walking tour in the George Square area, a visit to Princes Square, and a visit to the Barras Market.

span.strong: Please check out the Amazon Smiles Donation Link for our school:

div.p:
Dr. Mike Sacken, President
Kathy Ehmann-Clardy, Secretary
Raymond Howard, Vice President
Yvonne Whitaker, Assistant Secretary
Dr. Roger Doss
Dr. Carol Doss
Dr. Anthony Johnson

p.br:
Scheduled board meetings are held quarterly, 7:00 pm, Administration Bldg
Next meeting tentatively set for Nov. 20, 2019.

div.p: A post shared by Treetops School (@treetopsschool) on Apr 12, 2017 at 9:56am PDT

div.div: If your child is going to be absent, please email their homeroom teacher AND attendance@treetops.org (attach any excuse notes to email).
